casebody.data:
2002-1860 (La. 10/14/02)

PHYSICIAN’S BARIATRIC CLINIC OF LAFAYETTE, INC. v. Ophelia Jo GREATHOUSE, et al. No. 2002-C-1860. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Greathouse, Ophelia Jo et al.; Greathouse, Dan; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Lafayette, 15th Judicial District Court Div. K, Nos. 2001-1508-K; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-0898.

Denied.
